column4: is something supposed to happen when you plug in a usb-storage type camera ?  I can mount them manually- just wondering if there was supposed to be something in place to do it automatically.
most of my is in a tiny spot behind my eyes right now  :P    (headache)
I'm building a box with ubuntu for my nephew
you're a smart guy so I'm assuming you already tried System -> Prefs -> removable storage?
and this is supposed to work ?
looks like its supposed to pop up gthumb
I"ve never used hal/d-bus before - I'll look into it
libhal.c 840 : Error sending msg: No property info.capabilities on device with id /org/freedesktop/Hal/devices/usb_device_4cb_116_1000_-1_Y-388^^^^^030104WFC00002012478
